Prashant Kr. Sharma

Software Engineer // Spacecraft Operations Engg.

About Myself

I am an undergrad in Mechanical Engineering Dept with specialization in Manufacturing Science and Engg from IIT Kharagpur. I am a passionate coder and an aspiring mechatronics engineer.

Experience

R&D at Dassault Systemes

Working on development in Resource Programming (Robotics and Machining) branch of Delmia PLM software. Worked on Model-View-Controller architecture and software enhancement requirements from clients like Boeing requiring Mathematical knowledge on geometry and vectors.

2018-Present

Team Indus- Axiom Research Private Ltd.

Worked as Spacecraft Operations Engineer in devevloping Flight Control Procedures and maintaining Telemetry and Telecommand database. Was contact point for data budgeting on telemetring spacecraft health and had critical role in design optimization of Flight Software based on Mission Operations Team’s requirement. Point of contact for operational design and feedback of different subsystems - Thermal, Propulsion ,Control design , On-Board computer design, Communication subsystems. Designed algorithms and developed scripts in Python, Shell to automate trivial work for work flow automation.

2016 - 2018

Graduated IIT Kharagpur

Did my undergrad from Indian Institute of Technology IIT Kharagpur.

2012 - 2017

B.Tech Project in IIT Kharagpur

B.Tech project in Particle Image Velocimetry. Aerodynamic analysis on pitch movement of bird wings using NI LabVIEW toolkit for underwater environment simulation Analysis of jet impingement on vertical plates for different flow rates with PIV.

2015 - 2016

Astronomy Club Head -SPATS

Astronomy club head of Space Technology Student’s Society in IIT kharagpur for 2 years. Delivered lecture in IISER Bhopal on NASA’s Tensegrity model.

May 2015 - Feb 2016
